mapper.select: SELECT m.member_no , m.id , m.name , m.tel , m.other , m.company_no , m.contract_date , c.company_name , c.company_address , c.company_tel , c.brn , c.region FROM member m JOIN company c ON (m.company_no = c.company_no) WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT m.member_no , m.id , m.password , m.name , FIND_CD(m.position) AS position , FIND_CD(c.div) AS div , c.company_name , c.company_no , c.company_address , c.company_tel , c.brn FROM member m JOIN company c ON (m.company_no = c.company_no) WHERE m.id = #{id}
